description: Hidden in Peru’s remote Sierra del Divisor, Cerro El Cono is a mysterious, pyramid-shaped peak that has baffled scientists and inspired local legend. Visible from 250 miles away, this jungle-covered mountain could be a volcano, a spiritual Apu, or the remnants of an ancient civilization. Despite its sacred significance and ecological value, the region faces growing environmental threats, with recent reports questioning the effectiveness of its protected status. Discover why Cerro El Cono remains both a scientific mystery and a conservation challenge.
title: A Pyramid in the Amazon? The Mystery of Cerro El Cono in Peru's Sierra del Divisor

description: Arp 184, also known as NGC 1961, is a stunning yet asymmetrical spiral galaxy captured by NASA/ESA’s Hubble Space Telescope. Located about 190 million light-years away in the Camelopardalis constellation, it features a single, starry spiral arm and a rich history of supernovae. Included in Halton Arp’s Atlas of Peculiar Galaxies, Arp 184 stands out due to its irregular structure and dynamic star formation. Hubble’s Snapshot programs targeted it for both its unusual shape and its relevance to stellar explosion studies.
title: Hubble Captures Stunning Image of Peculiar Spiral Galaxy Arp 184 in Camelopardalis

description: Soyuz MS-26 safely landed in Kazakhstan on April 19, bringing NASA astronaut Don Pettit and two Russian cosmonauts back to Earth. The crew completed a months-long science mission aboard the ISS, conducting key experiments on 3D printing, water purification, fire behaviour, and plant biology, supporting future lunar and Mars exploration goals.
title: NASA’s Don Pettit Returns to Earth with Russian Crewmates After ISS Science Mission

description: On May 4, 2025—Star Wars Day—SpaceX launched 29 Starlink satellites aboard a Falcon 9 rocket from Florida. The flight marked the rocket booster’s 20th successful launch and landing, setting a reuse record. This mission carried the largest Starlink payload to date, advancing SpaceX’s goal of global broadband coverage through its growing satellite constellation in low Earth orbit.
title: Space X Falcon Launches 29 Starlink Satellites on Star Wars Day from Florida

description: Indian smartphone market had a tough start to the year, shows a report by Cyber Media Research. The domestic smartphone market dipped seven percent year-on-year (YoY) in the first quarter of 2025. Chinese smartphone brand Vivo led the smartphone market with 20 percent market share, while Samsung secured the second spot. Xiaomi, Oppo and Realme managed to get into the top third, fourth and fifth positions, respectively. Feature phone shipments declined 37 percent YoY, with Itel leading the segment.
title: Indian Smartphone Market Fell 7 Percent YoY in Q1 2025, Vivo Led the Way: CMR

description: OpenAI has walked back part of its effort to create a more conventional for-profit company. Microsoft, which has invested $13.75 billion (roughly Rs. 1,15,878 crore) in the startup, remains the biggest holdout among investors as the ChatGPT maker tries to restructure, according to several people familiar with the matter.
title: Microsoft Is Key Holdout for OpenAI Restructuring Plan

description: Tecno unveiled its Android 15-based HiOS 15 on Tuesday and listed the new artificial intelligence (AI) features that will ship with the update. The company said that its new AI features are aimed at Indian users with capabilities tailored to local needs. The brand also worked with Indian AI firm Sarvam AI to add vernacular speech to its Ella voice assistant.
title: Tecno HiOS 15 With New India-Focused AI Features, Improved Voice Assistant Unveiled

description: Emma Reynolds, the Economic Secretary of the Treasury, said that the UK was not looking to mirror the US in creating a national crypto stockpile. Reynolds did, however, say that the UK supported the US on increasing Web3-focussed collaborative efforts.
title: UK Treasury Secretary Dismisses Creation of US-Like National Crypto Reserve

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) has launched new International Roaming (IR) packages for the Gulf region. The new roaming packs are supported in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates (UAE). The introduction of these new plans is timely as they come right before the beginning of the Hajj pilgrimage this year.
title: Vi Introduces New International Roaming Packs for Gulf Region With Unlimited Incoming Calls

description: Xiaomi unveiled its Mix 4 back in 2021 with an under-display camera. The handset was one of the first mainstream flagships to offer the new camera technology that hides the front-facing sensor under the display. Rumours surrounding its possible successor, Xiaomi Mix 5, surfaced briefly in 2022 and 2023, before fading into silence—until recently. Now, the latest leaks suggest that Xiaomi is gearing up to launch a new Mix series smartphone, likely to be the Mix 5.
title: Xiaomi Mix 5 Rumoured to Return With Under-Display Selfie Camera

description: Apple is believed to offer a significant redesign for its iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max. A new leak coming out of China states that the company is testing under-display Face ID technology for the iPhone 18 Pro models. The vanilla iPhone 18 and iPhone 18 Slim (Air) could retain the Dynamic Island feature.
title: Apple Said to Be Testing Under-Display Face ID on iPhone 18 Pro, iPhone 18 Pro Max Models

description: Google is reportedly working on an expansion of Gemini Live by allowing it to connect to apps. As per the report, the Mountain View-based tech giant is working on a way to let Gemini Live perform certain app-based tasks without requiring intervention from the user. Gemini Live is a two-way, real-time voice conversation feature where the user can verbally ask the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot queries.
title: Google Might Be Working On Connecting Apps With Gemini Live: Report

description: Realme is set to unveil the GT 7 series in India soon, but the company has not yet announced the exact launch date. Meanwhile, Realme has unveiled a concept phone with a large 10,000mAh battery. It is said to have support for 320W wired fast charging.
title: Realme GT Concept Phone With 10,000mAh Battery Unveiled in India
Samsung Galaxy Fit3: Premium Fitness Tracking at Just ₹3,499

description: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor 2025, honoring Conan O’Brien, is now available on Netflix. The event includes comedic roasts, heartfelt tributes, and performance highlights, celebrating the cultural influence of humor. A must-watch for fans of satire, stand-up, and American comedy
title: Conan O’Brien's Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor 2025 Now Streaming on Netflix

description: Google recently published a blog post which details Material 3 Expressive, its next iteration of the open-source design language system for Android. While the post seems accidental and has since been taken down, it does provide a glimpse of the new design guidelines which the Mountain View-based tech giant seems to be keeping under wraps ahead of the official unveiling at Google I/O 2025 later this month.
title: Google Accidentally Leaks Material 3 ‘Expressive’ Design for Android Ahead of I/O 2025

description: Google is reportedly working on a new feature for Google Lens that will allow users to share live camera feed from their devices. As per the report, the new feature will combine the functionalities of Google Lens and the recently released experimental feature of Search — AI Mode. The new feature is reportedly dubbed “Live for AI Mode”.
title: Google Is Reportedly Working On AI Mode With Gemini Live-Like Features for Google Lens

description: Jack is a movie about Pablo, who leads a tragic life growing up. However, due to a childhood incident, he becomes an RAW agent. There, he, along with his colleague Manoj, is set on an operation to hunt the terrorists. The movie's suspense keeps the audience as what happens in this operation. Is it a successful mission, and whether the criminals are caught?
title: Jack OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Siddu Jonnalagadda's Film Online?

description: Kaalamega Karigindhi is a Telugu romantic drama that delves into the nostalgia of first love through poetic storytelling and evocative visuals. Directed by Singara Mohan, the film offers a reflective cinematic experience, garnering mixed reviews for its artistic approach and emotional depth.
title: Kaalamega Karigindhi OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Telugu Romantic Movie Online?

description: Oppo Reno 14 series is set to be unveiled in China soon. While the company has yet to officially announce the launch date for the phone, digital content creators in the country have started receiving invitations to the launch event that reveal the release date. The upcoming lineup is expected to include the base and Pro variants.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Series Launch Date Surfaces Online; Lineup May Include Base and Pro Variants

description: Netflix’s Squid Game Season 3 trailer teases an intense and emotional finale, featuring Gi-hun’s return, betrayals, and new psychological games. With the Front Man back and a new twist involving team divisions, the final season promises a dark, thrilling end to the global phenomenon.
title: Squid Game Season 3 OTT Release Date Revealed, New Teaser Out Now

description: Wolf Man is an American Horror story that follows a man saving his family from a werewolf. As he is bitten and hurt, he discovers, he is transforming into a monster. Will he be able to make it? Watch Wolf Man, streaming from May 17, 2025, only on JioHotstar.
title: Wolf Man OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Apple released its base iPhone models with the Pro variants for years. Now, the Cupertino-based tech giant seems to be planning to refresh this long-standing tradition of launching all flagship iPhone models in September every year. Apple is yet to reveal its original plans, but noted analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has claimed that Apple will shift to a twice-a-year launch schedule.
title: Apple Said to Follow Twice-a-Year Launch Schedule for iPhone, Budget Models to Debut in First Half of Year

description: Google is rolling out a homescreen widget for Gemini on Android. The widget was already available on iOS, and it is now being added to Android as well. It is a highly resizable widget that can be placed in two different style configurations and multiple size-based configurations. The widget comes equipped with all the different tools and features that the Android app offers.
title: Google Is Rolling Out a Resizable Gemini Widget for Android Homescreen

description: Honor 400 is expected to launch soon alongside the Honor 400 Pro variant as successors to the Honor 300 and Honor 300 Pro, respectively. The purported phones have surfaced online recently as several leaks and reports have suggested their expected key features. The Pro version was recently spotted on a popular benchmarking website. Now, the standard Honor 400 handset has appeared on the same site, as well.
title: Honor 400 Appears on Geekbench With Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC, 12GB RAM

description: The Nairobi High Court has asked Sam Altman's World project to permanently delete its citizens' biometric data and said that the controversial human ID project failed to acquire valid consent from the Office of the Data Protection Commissioner (ODPC) before obtaining the eye scans of Kenyan citizens to give them their World IDs.
title: Kenya Orders Sam Altman's World to Delete Citizens' Biometric Data Within 7 Days

description: Oppo Find X8 Ultra raises the bar for what a flagship camera smartphone should look like. The cut down on the weight works wonders for the Find X8 Ultra in daily use. The performance is top-notch, and the display is fantastic. Of course, the cameras are the biggest marquee feature and will remain one of the reasons why people may opt to buy this one. However, the limited availability of the Find X8 Ultra makes this one a tough recommendation. In China, the phone starts at roughly Rs. 76,000.
title: Oppo Find X8 Ultra Review: So Good, Yet So Far

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 series was launched in January and it came with a noticeable shift in terms of its processor. While the South Korean tech conglomerate preferred to use its in-house Exynos-branded chips in the Galaxy S24 and previous S series models, it adopted Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite in the entire Galaxy S25 lineup for all markets. However, an industry note suggests that Samsung may switch back to its proprietary Exynos 2600 for the purported Galaxy S26 series.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Tipped to Do Away With Snapdragon Chips; May Use Exynos 2600 SoC

description: The DoT has barred companies from linking connection of users in any form with any terminal or facility located outside the country's border as well as processing of their data overseas. The move assumes significance as the government is, for the first time, gearing up to open satellite communication service for the general public
title: DoT Issues Norms for Satcom Services as Musk's Starlink Looks to Enter Indian Market

description: Google is adding a new quality-of-life improvement to Gemini. On Monday, the company rolled out an update which now allows users to upload up to 10 images or files in one go. Earlier, the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot capped the limit at one image or file per prompt. The new feature is available on both the Gemini web client as well as the Android and iOS apps.
title: Google Gemini Now Accepts Multiple File Uploads With a Single Prompt

description: Motorola seems to be gearing up to unveil the Moto G56 5G. Although the Lenovo-owned brand has not publicly announced anything about a new G series handset, it has been spotted in a new leak that signals its release is on the cards. The leak suggests the complete specifications and design of the Moto G56 5G.
title: Moto G56 5G Full Specifications Leaked Online; Tipped to Get MediaTek Dimensity 7060 SoC, 5,200mAh Battery, More

description: Walmart-backed PhonePe announced its ‘Made in India’ SmartSpeaker for merchants on Monday. It is a wireless speaker that can verify payments received over the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) instant payment system via real-time audio alerts. The device comes with a built-in speaker and is available in up to 21 language options.
title: PhonePe Launches ‘Made in India’ SmartSpeaker With 4G Support and Extended Battery Life

description: Apple in a court notice said it will ask the San Francisco-based 9th US Circuit Court of Appeals to review the April 30 ruling, which found the company in contempt of an earlier order in a 2020 antitrust lawsuit brought by Epic Games. Apple's appeal notice did include its planned legal arguments.
title: Apple Will Appeal Contempt Ruling in Epic Games Case Over App Store

description: OpenAI has announced it will not convert into a traditional for-profit company, following legal consultations and external feedback. Instead, the firm will transition its commercial arm into a Public Benefit Corporation (PBC), ending its 100x profit cap and allowing more investor returns while maintaining its non-profit governance structure. The non-profit entity will continue to govern the PBC.
title: OpenAI Drops For-Profit Plans, Will Transition to Non-Profit-Governed Public Benefit Corporation

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 are rumoured to be in development as the latest-generation foldables from the company. Ahead of their anticipated debut some time later this year, battery capacities of both the purported book-style and clamshell-style foldable phones have been revealed via a certification site. While the Galaxy Z Flip 7 is said to get an increase in its battery size, its foldable equivalent may have an unchanged capacity.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Battery Capacities Tipped via Certification Site

description: The US DoJ has proposed that Alphabet's Google divest its AdX advertising marketplace and ad server DFP. Google has said the company supported behavioural remedies such as making real-time bids available to competitors, but that prosecutors cannot legally pursue a bid to force it to sell parts of its business.
title: US Seeks Breakup of Google's Ad-Tech Products After Judge Finds Illegal Monopoly

description: YouTube is testing a two-person subscription plan for its Premium service. The company said that they are piloting the new tier in four countries, including India. It is expected to roll out to all users eventually. This is being seen as a move to push YouTube's subscription growth. Much like the Spotify Duo plan, the two-person YouTube Premium membership will allow two individuals to share a subscription.
title: YouTube Testing Two-Person Premium Subscription Plans in India

description: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ could arrive as an addition to the existing iQOO Neo 10 series in China. A tipster suggested the moniker of the purported handset, while another hinted at its probable launch timeline and expected key specifications. The standard iQOO Neo 10 and the Neo 10 Pro were launched in the country in November 2024.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ Moniker Surfaces Online; Launch Timeline, Key Features Tipped

description: OnePlus India announced its plans to release OnePlus 13s in India last month. The brand has not yet shared the exact launch date, but it has posted a new teaser revealing the display design and colour options of the latest OnePlus 13 series phone. It appears to arrive as a rebranded version of the OnePlus 13T that went on sale in China last month.
title: OnePlus 13s Design Fully Revealed in New Teaser; Confirmed to Debut in Two Colour Options

description: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra could be launched in India soon. The Lenovo-owned brand has teased the arrival of the Razr 60 Ultra in India via a social media post. The clamshell-style foldable phone was launched in the global markets on April 24 as the successor to the Razr 50 Ultra and comes with the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, 50-megapixel dual rear cameras, and support for artificial intelligence (AI) features. The Indian variant of the handset is also confirmed to offer similar internals.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip, Moto AI Suite Confirmed to Launch in India Soon

description: Realme GT 7 was launched in China last month and it is officially teased to make its way to the Indian market soon. The company has shared a teaser around the phone’s impending arrival and it is expected to debut as part of the Realme GT 7 series which may include another model too — the Realme GT 7T. As per a report, both of the upcoming Realme phones were also spotted on a certification site which further confirms their imminent debut in India.
title: Realme GT 7 Series Teased to Launch in India Soon; Two Models Reportedly Listed on BIS Ahead of Debut
